title: Kim Kardashian shares portrait with 3 of her 4 children... after house call from Dr. Simon Ourian
text:
Kim Kardashian West shared a recent portrait of herself with daughter Chicago, 21 months; son Saint, 3; and daughter North, 6; at their $14M, 4,500K-acre ranch in Wyoming.

The 38-year-old KUWTK star also has a five-month-old son Psalm with her third husband Kanye West, whom she wed in 2014 after two years of dating.

The Calabasas socialite also Insta-storied a snap of her Pomeranian puppies Soba/Soy Sauce and Saké, whom she adopted back on September 20.

'Squad': Kim Kardashian West shared a recent portrait of herself with (from L-R) daughter Chicago, 21 months; son Saint, 3; and daughter North, 6; at their $14M, 4,500K-acre ranch in Wyoming

Kim's family posts came two days after she received a house call from Dr. Simon Ourian to avoid being photographed at his clinic, Epione Beverly Hills.

'So there's nothing I'd rather do late at night when my kids go to bed, I'm done with work for the day - then to have a late night house call by Dr. Simon Ourian,' Kardashian said in a video.

The SKIMS CEO's younger sister Khloé made a point of 'stopping by' her mansion to get facials, lasers, and non-surgical jawline contouring.

'Look at that, defined jaw,' the 35-year-old Revenge Body host told her big sister in her Insta-story.

Still going strong! The 38-year-old KUWTK star also has a five-month-old son Psalm with her third husband Kanye West, whom she wed in 2014 after two years of dating (posted Sunday)

Gazing outside: The Calabasas socialite also Insta-storied a snap of her Pomeranian puppies Soba/Soy Sauce and Saké, whom she adopted back on September 20

'You can't be the only one in on the fun!'

The 52-year-old cosmetic dermatologist gave their half-sister Kylie Jenner her artificially-plumped pout - as well as treating Jenna Dewan, Lady Gaga, and Cara Delevingne.

Catch more of the wrongful incarceration advocate and her family in the 17th season of Keeping Up with the Kardashians, which airs Sundays on E!

The Kardashian-Jenner clan scored nominations for four trophies - including best reality show - at the People's Choice Awards, which air November 10 on E!

Kim's family posts came two days after she received a house call from Dr. Simon Ourian (L) to avoid being photographed at his clinic, Epione Beverly Hills

'Look at that, defined jaw!' The SKIMS CEO's younger sister Khloé (R) made a point of 'stopping by' her mansion to get facials, lasers, and non-surgical jawline contouring

'You can't be the only one in on the fun!' The 52-year-old cosmetic dermatologist gave their half-sister Kylie Jenner (pictured Wednesday) her artificially-plumped pout - as well as treating Jenna Dewan, Lady Gaga, and Cara Delevingne

Khloé and Kylie will both compete for best reality star, and Kim scored nods for best social celebrity and best style star.

The aspiring attorney spends 18 hours a week studying law under the guidance of Van Jones, Jessica Jackson, and Erin Haney so that she can pass the California State Bar in 2024.

On October 25, Kanye will drop his IMAX movie Jesus Is King all about the making of his long-delayed album as well as Sunday Service.

The 42-year-old rapper-designer's ninth studio album will feature artists like Ant Clemons, Nicki Minaj, Ty Dolla Sign, Clipse, Kenny G, and Fred Hammond.

'Have You Met Kim?' Catch more of the wrongful incarceration advocate and her family in the 17th season of Keeping Up with the Kardashians, which airs Sundays on E!
description: The 38-year-old KUWTK star's snap appeared to be  taken at their $14M, 4,500K-acre ranch in Wyoming
